mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rosecrans, William Starke
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Aug 2 1861. By Telegraph from Clarksburg 2 1861. What sort of material is the artillery company offered Yes I can arm but many artillery offers are made me & I wish to take care in the selection WS Rosecrans Brig Genl USA 29D92pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Rosecrans, William Starke
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
